name: adsp_tcf_project
description: Main package file for the TCF Project
author: See repository readme

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend/public-api && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.deploy:backend: docker-compose up --build -d mongodb python-backend && cd backend/public-api && npm run dev
scripts.dev:all: npm exec --prefix backend/public-api concurrently "npm run deploy:mongo" "npm run dev:ds" "npm run dev:pub" "npm run deploy:frontend"
